title.native: 天才王子の赤字国家再生術
title.romaji: Tensai Ouji no Akaji Kokka Saisei Jutsu
title.english: The Genius Prince's Guide to Raising a Nation Out of Debt

description:
Once upon a time in a far away land there lived a prince, a genius prince. The genius prince fought alongside his people and led them to a great many triumphs. However, truth be told, he just wants to let everything go and live in tranquility.

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: บูรณะมันวุ่นวาย ขายชาติเลยแล้วกัน
天才王子的赤字国家振兴术
Kiat Pemulihan Negara Berutang Ala Pangeran Genius

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Kingdom Management
tags.description: Characters in these series take on the responsibility of running a town or kingdom, whether they take control of an existing one, or build their own from the ground up.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Economics
tags.description: Centers around the field of economics.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

node.description: Still animates on occasions, but is mostly retired as an animator.

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ToshiSahashi)

__Toshihiko Sahashi__ is a Japanese composer and arranger. He graduated from Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music in 1986. Sahashi has composed music for various anime series (including OVAs, films, and drama CDs), video games, films, dramas, and musicals.

The style of his composition is richly symphonic and classical (occasionally jazz). The use of sophisticated compositional techniques, as well as complicated harmony writing such as fugue can often be heard in his work, demonstrating his solid training in the western classical music. He also uses keyboard instruments to deliver more sentimental soundtracks to good effect.
The CEO of Yokohama Animation Lab

[Website](https://thesixthlie.jp)

The Sixth Lie is a Japanese electronic rock band formed in May 2015 in Tokyo, Japan. Their music is known for its hybrid style inspired by the latest western music, and their overall science fiction-inspired theme connected to near future and outer space.

__[Website](http://yanaginagi.net/) | [Personal Twitter](https://twitter.com/yanaginagi) | [Professional Twitter](https://twitter.com/yanaginagi_info)__

__Introduction:__
yanaginagi, alternatively known as Gazelle, or otherwise simply known as nagi, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and arranger under record label NBC Universal. She is known for performing as a guest singer for the band [supercell](https://anilist.co/staff/103913/supercell) under the name nagi from 2009-2011.

__Biography:__
During her childhood, she first became interested in music with the help of an electronic organ her mother received from the neighboring residents. She would go on to start composing music during Junior High School using DTM (Desktop Music) software her brother had bought.

In 2006, as a 19 year old, she would start making her indie debut by posting songs to the music site Player's Kingdom, where she would go on to produce many original songs. She has also posted songs to the video sharing site Nico Nico Douga under the name Gazelle, and participated as one of the singers in "Lantis Suite feat. Nico Nico Artists". During her stay at Nico Nico Douga, she would at one point come in contact with [ryo](https://anilist.co/staff/109941/ryo), the leader of supercell, which eventually led her to start working with him. A couple of years later in March 2008, she would retire from music activites on the site Nico Nico Douga.

On February 29, 2012, she would make her major debut by releasing the single "[Vidro Moyou](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7_iMfWt1hA8)" through Geneon Universal.

(Source: [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%84%E3%81%AA%E3%81%8E%E3%81%AA%E3%81%8E), edited)

__Height:__ 150 cm

[Fanclub](https://www.gokinjolno.jp/) | [Blog](http://nanjolno.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nanjolno) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nanjolno/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFJORT2GGeNsKKLCf3BqSEQ)

She was the vocalist of the band fripSide and graduated in April 2022 with the fripSide Phase 2 Final Arena Tour. Likes cats, Final Fantasy XIV (even dubbed and sung the battle theme of Suzaku), and ramen.

**Non anime roles:**
- Soltina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Noise - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Topaz - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Shu - Arknights (VG)
- Junah - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Trigger - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)
